name: Hoppy Mary
description:
A demon threatens to open a breach between the divine and mortal worlds. Only you, Mary the Nun, can stop Azalganothiokorbinus..... well, that's the issue. The only way to banish this demon is to recite its full name from the prayer scroll. Having been alive for thousands of years, this demon has acquired many names. At this point, it takes a full 20 seconds of recitation to perform the banishment. Do you have what it takes to evade the Azalganoth... Jr's attacks, protect Mary, and banish the demon... using only ONE BUTTON?

Credits:

Music - DrSanic

Color Palette - Mushroom by Jimison3

Font - Pixeboy by Abas Creative
